ChangeLogs.Description: Fix an issue with partial curse matches with no files or modules causing the whole curse scan to fail.

Add an 'Open Folder' option to the addon context menu (By Xathz).
Add command line paramater to start the app minimized '-m' (By Noxis).
Add command line paramater to start the app and quit after auto updates are complete '-q' (By Noxis).
Add selector for when the app fails to automatically find WoW install folders.
Add the ability to select multiple addons and update their AutoUpdate status.
Add the ability to select multiple addons and update their Channel.
Add the ability to select multiple addons and re-install them.
Add the ability to select multiple addons and un-install them.
Featured addons are now sorted by download count.
Addon icons should now be updated when a change is detected.
The system tray icon will now show the window when double clicked.
Fix another CurseForge API error.

Fix another CurseForge API error.
Add some better error logging around CurseForge scanning.
Fix an issue with handling CurseForge API responses.
Fix a visual bug where auto updated addons were not shown up to date on the My Addons page.

Auto updates should function more like you would expect.
System Notifications should appear when addons are auto updated.
Re-Scan is now less desctructive, should preserve channels and auto update state.
Add the ability to update multiple clients at once by right clicking update-all.
Bug fixes.
UI Updates.
Actually fix the switch from stable to beta WowUp client?
Fix bug where the proper WowUp release channel version was not selected.
When using alpha/beta addons, the latest release will always be recommended even if its not the same release type.
Fix an issue causing a selected WoW client path to be overwritten at startup.
Fix an issue with Alpha/Beta addons not being properly selected.

Default addon channel can now be set separately per World of Warcraft client.
Addons can now be set to auto update by default per World of Warcraft client.
Attempt to make updating safer with rollback ability.
Context information added to the bottom screen bar.
Small indicator for auto updated addons.
When closing WowUp maximized it should start back up maximized.
UI updates.
Bug Fixes.

Remember the last selected client type.
New updater companion app, to deal with in-app update issues.
Fix bug with local image paths for certain users.

Add column sorting for My Addons page.
Try out new error tracking service for telemetry users.

All new scanning method, better results less 'Install' button.
WowInterface support during scan.
Better TukUI support.
New filtering on the 'My Addons' page.
System tray icons should not hang around after you close the app.
New option to switch between Stable and Beta WowUp releases.
UI improvements.
Performance improvements.

When running the app multiple times the original window should restore instead of showing an alert.
Add some color to the In-App update bar to make it more noticeable.
Add a column with the provider name to 'My Addons' page.

Change the value used for current version for Curse addons.
This will require you to re-update all Curse addons.
Bind the client type dropdown on 'My Addons' and 'Get Addons' to the same value to reduce confusion.

Fix crash bug related to 'Update All' and alpha/beta addons.
Fix issue causing updated alpha/beta addons to revert to stable.

Add Wow Interface integration for Scanning.
Add Wow Interface intergration for 'Install from URL'.
Performance updates.

Fix install error when an addon has no files matching the selected channel.
Attempt to fix some perfomance issues during install.
Speed up the scan process.

In-App updates should now use the same GitHub download as the website.
If the In-App update fails to download dont just leave the user with a .bak file.
Attempt to fix startup crash bug from windows for some users.

Improve TukUI support while scanning, will now check for X-Tukui-ProjectID for improved results.
Attempted to make the app single instance, so you cant launch it a bunch of times.

Fix issue where addons from TukUI would not install correctly.
Add confirmation box to addon uninstall.
Newly installed addons should appear in the correct spot in the list, not the bottom.
Uninstalling an addon sould be reflected on the 'Get Addons' page.
Refreshing the 'Get Addons' page should show the correct addons now.
Addon lists should scroll a little more smoothly.
Add the ability to set a global addon channel.
Fix issue with update button being shown over progress bar during auto update.

Add the ability to set an addon as Auto Update, should happen on app start and when hitting refresh.
Added confirmation to the re-scan button to help avoid confusion.

Add ability to install from GitHub URLS.
Add crude error reporting for telemetry users.
Tidy up options screen.
Fix an issue with beta client crashing the app when detected.
Attempt to fix issues with maxmizing the window going being the taskbar.

Add basic addon search for Curse and TukUi.
Add Patreon button.
Fix issue with new version check happening too fast.
Fix crash bug when a search result has no valid file.

Add support for Addon Channels (Stable/Beta/Alpha).
Improved context menu UI.
Fix bug with trying to install TukUi from Get Addons page.
Images should look much better now.
Fix various UI bugs.
Try to add beta support.

My Addon list should no longer duplicate when hitting update-all.
New scrollbar style.
When trying to guess installed addons, prefer toc metadata.
Hopefully improve install/uninstall breaking the app during certain actions.

Requires Re-Scan.
Support for different locations per WoW client.
UI updates.
Add ignore right-click option.
Add option for collapse to tray.

Add In-App updating and restart.
Add Open Sans font to be more readible?

Add TukUI addons to the 'Get Addons' tab.
Add in some window position saving on Windows.
Add per monitor DPI awareness on Windows.
Add telemetry opt-in.
Fix issue with update-all.

Added Right-Click Re-Install.
Added Right-Click Uninstall.
Report installed versoin, jazz up the user-agent.
Add the new Get Addons screen.

Rename a column in the database.
Add install tracking analytics.

Requires Re-Scan.
Add addon name clicks to open their URL.
Jazz up the about page.

More protection against weird toc files.
Improvements to re-scan function.

Add some extra logging and error catching.
Fix some issues searching curse for addons for PTR clients.

Add Show Log Files button.
Add in recurring call to check for app updates every 10 minutes.
Better wow folder selection validation.
Add correct task bar icon.

Add version checking to alert users of a new version available.
